email_template.subject: Invitation to Interview for AI Engineer Position at Zelora Tech
email_template.body:
Dear MATHUSHA SIVAANANTHAN,

We were impressed by your strong background in computer science and engineering, as well as your relevant experience in developing end-to-end software solutions. We believe your skills and experience make you a great fit for the AI Engineer position at Zelora Tech, and we would like to invite you for an interview.

We have scheduled an interview for Thursday, February 05, 2026 at 5:00 PM (IST), which will last for 1 hour. We would be delighted if you could join us at this time. Could you please confirm your availability for this scheduled time slot?

We look forward to the opportunity to discuss your application and how you can contribute to Zelora Tech.

Best regards,
The Zelora Tech Talent Team
hr@zeloratech.com
